title: Tikehau Capital Sees Promise in Secondary Private-Debt Investing
sub_head: The Paris-based alternative-investments manager is one of few buyers in the nascent market
body:
Tikehau Capital is one of relatively few investment firms to embrace the expanding secondary market for private-debt assets.
As with private-equity investing, an increase in capital flowing into sponsored debt and credit vehicles is fostering secondary activity with more fund limited partners seeking exits as they manage their holdings, said Pierpaolo Casamento, a New York-based Tikehau director. He leads the firmâ€™s private-debt secondaries strategy.
